quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词（如acceleration/accumulation）混淆，或因词根“culture”误判为“文化积累”而非“适应新文化”。
quiz_item.sentence: After moving to the US, Maria experienced a long process of **acculturation**, which involved learning to adapt to the new language, food, and social norms.

option.definition: （个体或群体）适应新文化的过程
